sentences.en: Britain and Prussia got the better of it.
sentences.cn: 英国和普鲁士从中得到利益.

sentences.en: Can you find me some information about Prussia?
sentences.cn: 你能给我找到一些关于普鲁士的资料 吗 ?

sentences.en: East Prussia and the rest of Germany were separated, in 1919, by the Polish corridor.
sentences.cn: 东普鲁士和德国的其他地区于1919年被波兰走廊分隔。

sentences.en: Franco - Prussian War: France declares war on Prussia.
sentences.cn: 1870年的今天,法 - 普战争(或译普法战争)中,法国向普鲁士宣战.

sentences.en: Hanover was incorporated into Prussia in 1886.
sentences.cn: 汉诺威市于1886年并入普鲁士.

sentences.en: His parents were from East Prussia.
sentences.cn: 他的父母是东普鲁士人.

sentences.en: In 1870 came a long - pending struggle for predominance in Europe between France and Prussia.
sentences.cn: 1870年出现了法国和普鲁士间争夺欧洲主导权的 长期 未决斗争.

sentences.en: My parents are in Prussia . Their names are Hanna and Yoko Palmon.
sentences.cn: 我父母在普拉斯左营,名叫哈娜和雅各.帕尔曼.

sentences.en: Prussia made him an honorary citizen.
sentences.cn: 普鲁士市授予他“荣誉市民”的称号.

sentences.en: RS Prussia Steeple Mold Creamer & Sugar Bowl!
sentences.cn: 遥感普鲁士斯蒂普尔 克里默 和糖碗!

sentences.en: The core of Germany is Prussia.
The region a duchy in 1806 and was absorbed by Prussia in 1866.
sentences.cn: 该地区在1806年成为领地并于1866年被普鲁士接收.

sentences.en: These were appareled after the fashion of Prussia.
sentences.cn: 这些是仿照普鲁士的服装打扮的.

sentences.en: They are killing older people now in Prussia, they buried them up in the forest.
sentences.cn: 在普拉斯左营,他们正杀害老人, 然后埋在森林里.

sentences.en: What did Prussia and Austria contend about in their last war?
sentences.cn: 在上一场战争中普鲁士和奥地利争夺的焦点是什么?

trans.tran_cn: 普鲁士（位于北欧，1701年起成为王国，1871年建立了统一的德意志帝国）
